name: SlimeVM
description:
Slime VM Official Egg
Made by: dragonxspider
Support: https://discord.gg/kFNd2EDJNN

Privileged container giving near-full Ubuntu VPS feel.
Illegal activities (DDoS, mining etc.) = instant suspension by admin!
Use only for legal purposes.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
cd /mnt/server || exit 1

# Clean old files if any
rm -rf ./*

# Basic packages for a usable system
apt-get update -y
apt-get install -y sudo curl wget nano vim net-tools openssh-server passwd ca-certificates gnupg lsb-release software-properties-common apt-transport-https

# Enable root login & set random password
echo "root login allowed"
ROOT_PASS=\( (openssl rand -base64 14 | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9')
echo "root: \){ROOT_PASS}" | chpasswd

# Get external IP (approximate, real mein panel ke allocation se use karo)
EXT_IP=\( (curl -s ifconfig.me || echo "your-panel-ip")

# Create ssh.txt
echo "SlimeVM Access Details" > ssh.txt
echo "SSH Command: ssh root@ \){EXT_IP} -p {{server.build.default_port}}" >> ssh.txt
echo "Password: ${ROOT_PASS}" >> ssh.txt
echo "" >> ssh.txt
echo "!! WARNING !!" >> ssh.txt
echo "DDoS, crypto mining, spam, illegal activities = INSTANT SUSPENSION" >> ssh.txt
echo "Use responsibly - only legal purposes allowed." >> ssh.txt

# MOTD (login pe dikhega)
cat > /etc/motd << 'EOL'
Slime VM Official Egg
Made by: dragonxspider
Support: https://discord.gg/kFNd2EDJNN

Welcome to your SlimeVM instance!

Allocated Resources:
CPU: {{server.build.limit.cpu}}%
RAM: {{server.build.limit.memory}} MB
Disk: {{server.build.limit.disk}} MB

!! STRICT RULES !!
- No DDoS
- No crypto mining
- No spam / illegal content
Violation = immediate suspension by admin.

Enjoy responsibly!
EOL

# SSH config tweaks
sed -i 's/#PermitRootLogin prohibit-password/PermitRootLogin yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
sed -i 's/#Port 22/Port {{server.build.default_port}}/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config || echo "Port {{server.build.default_port}}" >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config
sed -i 's/#PasswordAuthentication yes/PasswordAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config

# Start SSH in foreground (Pterodactyl needs process to stay alive)
/usr/sbin/sshd -D -e &

# Keep container alive + show MOTD simulation
echo "SlimeVM ready! Check ssh.txt for login details."
sleep infinity
